q: Staff Writer Friday, January 28, 2011 Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not run for president in 2012 but has left the door open to running for governor of the Hoosier State. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star. She hired a then-unknown piano player for that engagement; a young man fresh from New Orleans named Harry Connick, Ray Charles , who later introduced her at a David Letterman Christmas party as one of the world's finest jazz singers. That four-week engagement lasted for three years for Cynthia Scott , and she decided to stay in New York. Since then, she has headlined at Birdland, Iridium, Dizzy's Club Coca Cola and many more.
